result.purpose: Responsible for providing a client implementation to interact with the Moralis Solana API for retrieving balance and NFT data.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client functionality and data models for clean separation of concerns.

internal/infras/moralis_solana/client.go.purpose: Client implementation for interacting with the Moralis Solana API to retrieve balance and NFT data.

internal/infras/moralis_solana/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for interacting with the Moralis Solana API.
